name: USBorderWaitTimes
0:
”Alexa, ask Border Wait about Peace Bridge”
”Alexa, ask Border Wait the status of Rio Grande City”
”Alexa, ask Border Wait for help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: border wait
des:
This skill enables Alexa to tell you the crossing times and delays associated with any given border crossing point along the Canadian or Mexican borders of the United States.

This skill can be used from any Alexa enabled device, including Amazon Echo, iOS (e.g., Reverb) and Android.

You can say: "Alexa, ask Border Wait for help"

Other example questions include:

"Alexa, ask Border Wait the status of Rio Grande City"

-or-

"Alexa, ask Border Wait about Niagara Falls"

-or-

"Alexa, ask Border Wait about Whirlpool Bridge"

You may also ask Border Wait to list port names by border or by U.S. State. For example: 

"Alexa, ask Border Wait for a list of ports."

- or -

"Alexa, ask Border Wait to list ports in Texas."

You can find a comprehensive list of U.S. Border Ports and Crossing Names at https://bwt.cbp.gov/index.html
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
